message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for $1200000. It's a truly unique opportunity, and I believe it will be highly valuable for you.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $950000 for this item. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $950000 is a bit lower than I can accept at this time. Let's find a middle ground.  I'm willing to come down to $1050000. This reflects the product's true value and provides you with a significant advantage.  Let me know if this works for you.

I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to consider $1075000 as a counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
